Hi all,

I wrote a pile of tests for my current project. Tests are running =
OK
when I run each of them individually. Every time I run a testSuite I
got=
 a summary report about what methods failed and which passed. I
think this =
is Junit's expected behaviour.

The point is that when I try to run my test=
Suites alltogether at a
time, I got no summary (just a line telling me the =
most general test,
the one which launches the other testSuites, passed). It=
 seems that
Junit stops quietly, so I am afraid it may fail. 

On the other=
 hand, I forced some of the tests to fail, then I got some
summary output b=
ut only for those methods which failed. 

I do know whether this is related=
 to my code or is it an issue from
Junit. I would be glad if anybody famili=
ar with this could shed some
light...

Thanks in advance

Diego
